content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5). This structure is intended to generate electricity by converting water into steam.

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) which processes iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) that extracts iron ore from the ground.

### Wooden chests
Multiple wooden chests are located at the following positions:
- Position (46.5, -83.5)
- Position (48.5, -83.5)
- Position (5.5, -79.5)
- Position (10.5, -79.5)
- Position (-4.5, -63.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting Boiler and Steam Engine
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine. Currently, there are no pipes available.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure the Offshore Pump is in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors with furnace inventory
- The furnace is full and cannot accept more resources. Monitor the furnace inventory to avoid this issue.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
